resources.string:
If you like this library project and you are willing to support me, you can donate me via Alipay or PayPal.

Alipay: fythonx\@gmail.com
PayPal: Click PAYPAL button to open a new tab.
TETETETETETE TETETETE TETETETE TETETETETE BAAT MAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAN.\n\nTest Message.

Hello darkness, my old friend I\'ve come to talk with you again Because a vision softly creeping Left its seeds while I was sleeping And the vision that was planted in my brain Still remains Within the sound of silence.\n\nThe summary text of each step is optional. If you haven\'t set, summary view won\'t be displayed.

In restless dreams I walked alone Narrow streets of cobblestone \'Neath the halo of a street lamp I turned my collar to the cold and damp When my eyes were stabbed by the flash of a neon light That split the night And touched the sound of silence.
